# Almaz Bisenbaev

## Name Variations
- Almaz Bisenbaev
- Almaz Bissenbayev
- Алмаз Бисенбаев
- Алмаз Бисембаев

*Note: All name variations above refer to the same individual.*

## Professional Summary
Full-Stack Web Developer with expertise in modern web technologies and content management systems. Specialized in creating responsive, user-friendly websites and applications.

## Technical Skills
- **Frontend**: ReactJS, NextJS, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3
- **Backend**: Node.js, PHP
- **CMS & E-commerce**: WordPress, WooCommerce
- **Design & Prototyping**: Figma
- **Version Control**: Git

## Professional Experience

### Web Development Projects
- **silverskincoffee.ie** - E-commerce platform for coffee products (WordPress, WooCommerce)
- **autosl.de** - Premium automotive sales platform with custom API integration (WordPress, Custom Plugin)
- **muafaktur.de** - E-commerce site for beauty products and training courses (WooCommerce)
- **monitask.com** - Multilingual WordPress solution with automated page generation

### Open Source Contributions
- **WP Power Tools** - WordPress utility plugin for developers
- **Glowy Icons** - Vector icon set for designers and developers
